LanguageData.RocketMan.Settings.PleaseUnpause: Please unpause the game... RocketMan is warming up!
LanguageData.RocketMan.Settings.PleaseWait: Please wait... RocketMan is warming up!
LanguageData.RocketMan.IncompatibilityWindow.Title: You are running incompatible mods
LanguageData.RocketMan.IncompatibilityWindow.Descript: You are running incompatibile mods with RocketMan. This type of incompatilibity will nuke/destroy your save! You can Disable RocketMan or You continue on your own responsibility.\nCurrent incompatible mods are:\n
LanguageData.RocketMan.IncompatibilityWindow.Disclaim: The RocketMan team will provide no support if you choose to ignore this message or continue!
LanguageData.RocketMan.Alert_StatsLearning.Label: Adaptive mode is active
LanguageData.RocketMan.Alert_StatsLearning.Explanatio: Adaptive mode has been active for {0} minutes! It is recomended to have it running for {1} minutes per new save or when you change your mods.
LanguageData.RocketMan.AdaptiveAlert.Label: Enable adaptive mode alert
LanguageData.RocketMan.AdaptiveAlert.Description: Disable this if you don't want the adaptive mode alert in your alert list.
LanguageData.RocketMan.HideProgressBar: You can hide/disable in RocketMan's settings
LanguageData.RocketMan.FixBeauty.Tip: Beauty scan radius will change depending on what the pawn is doing. Use at your own risk.
LanguageData.RocketMan.GenMapSize.Text: Set the map size/shape for the next generated map. (after generating said map this option will reset back to default)
LanguageData.RocketMan.GenMapSize.Note: Please note that the new map will have a width/height that is dividable by region height (this rounding process is automatic).
LanguageData.RocketMan.Experimental.Description: Here you can opt in RocketMan Beta features.\nWarning: do not do this if you don't know what you're doing.
LanguageData.RocketMan.EnableGagarin: Enable load time reduction (Faster loading times)
LanguageData.RocketMan.EnableGagarin.Tip: RocketMan will attempt to reduce your loading time by caching Xml patch operations. After you active this settings restart your game twice inorder to RocketMan to create the cache. Depending on how many mods you use and what mods you could see upto 2x faster loading time. This is recommended to be used with Xml patch heavy mods such as Combat Extended or Doc universal.
LanguageData.RocketMan.ShowIcon.Description: Due to game limiations some options aren't available from the game menu settings.
LanguageData.RocketMan.ProgressBar: Show warmup progress bar on startup
LanguageData.RocketMan.ProgressBar.Description: This will show a warmup progress bar when you load a new map.
LanguageData.RocketMan.CorpseRemoval.Description: This removes corpses that aren't in view for a while and that aren't near your base to avoid breaking the game balance.
LanguageData.RocketMan.DisableForcedSlowdowns.Descrip: Disable forced slowdowns by game events. Disable this if you are using SmartSpeed.
LanguageData.RocketMan.Adaptive.Description: Enable for 30 minutes after creating a new save or changing your mod list.
LanguageData.RocketMan.Debugging.Description: Only for advanced users and modders
LanguageData.Soyuz.DilationFactor: Dilation Factors are numbers from 0.1 to 1.0. The lower the number used, dilation will be done at a lower rate. Higher number results in performance increase but introduce the chance of animation issues. Recommended value is 0.6 for offscreen and 0.2 for on screen.
LanguageData.Soyuz.GeneralTip: You can use the settings below to fix any issues with dilated pawns.
LanguageData.Soyuz.EnableTimeWorldPawns: Enable time dilation for world pawns
LanguageData.Soyuz.EnableTimeCriticalHediffs: Enable time dilation for pawns with critical hediffs
LanguageData.Soyuz.EnableTimeColonyAnimals: Enable time dilation for colony animals
LanguageData.Soyuz.EnableTimeColonists.Warning: WARNING: This is extremely dangerous. DO NOT USE THIS unless the mod author allow you to do so. Using this can break your saves and result in strange behaviour
LanguageData.Soyuz.Current.Tip: Only tune the settings below if you know what you are doing. These settings help you customize the selected race.
LanguageData.Soyuz.Current.FastPawn: This pawn move too fast to be throttled
LanguageData.Soyuz.Current.Ignored: This pawn will be ignored because:
LanguageData.Soyuz.Current.MoveSpeed: This kind move at an average speed of {0} cell/seconds
LanguageData.Proton.DisalbeAllInfo: If you have Dub's performance analyzer installed RocketMan will override its alert control system. Use this one instead.
LanguageData.Proton.IgnoreThis: Ignore this (will revert to vanilla behavior)
LanguageData.Proton.GlowGrid.Description: In the event of map lighting change this optimization will ensure that only a small part of the GlowGrid is updated.
LanguageData.Proton.GlowGrid.Limiter: Increase the number of Glowers required
LanguageData.Proton.GlowGrid.Limiter.Tip: Increase the number of Glowers required for the optimization. This will make Proton default to vanilla code in case of very few Glowers. This will provide a more consistent boost.
LanguageData.Gagarin.ParsingReports: RocketMan is checking for any duplicated Bases or Defs
LanguageData.Gagarin.Expiry: Gagarin cache will expire in: {0} days
LanguageData.Gagarin.Tip: As long as load time optimization is active it will cache every XML Def. This allows you to skip XML patching. You can disable it from the main menu in RocketMan
LanguageData.Gagarin.ClearCache.Description: Clearing the cache can help resolve XML caching issues incase of a mod update as well as allowing new textures to be cached.\nIt is recommended to clear it every other day.
LanguageData.Gagarin.EnableTextureCaching.Description: Texture caching will speedup your loading time but is not compatible with Graphics Settings mod or High quality textures mod.
LanguageData.Gagarin.AdvancedSettings.Description: Please only use these if you know what you are doing!
